settings.main.component.body.li.elements: Manage document elements and style them.
settings.main.component.body.li.email.bo: Configure e-mail settings, e-mail templates, mailing-lists & send e-mail messages.
settings.main.component.body.li.export.b: Export an entire project as a zip file.
settings.main.component.body.li.import.b: Import an entire project from a zip file.
settings.main.component.body.li.logs.and: Apache2 access & error logs can be viewed here...
settings.main.component.body.li.mode.bod: Switch environments: development, staging or production.
settings.main.component.body.li.nodes.bo: Data nodes can be configured and managed here.
plugins: custom functions & modifiers can be configured here.
settings.main.component.body.li.routes.b: Manage routes, module & submodule, commands & subcommands, paths, methods & redirects.
settings.main.component.body.li.services: Handle custom services, core & cms are read-only.
settings.main.component.body.li.styleshe: Handle document stylesheets and make beautiful pages.
settings.main.component.body.li.token.se: Logged in users have a token, here you can configure the settings.
settings.section.import.body.title: Import
settings.section.body.title: Settings
settings.section.basic.site.main.body.te: At the settings tab you can configure the e-mail settings.
These settings are the mail server settings.
If you don't provide the e-mail configuration, the system isn't capable of sending e-mails.
settings.section.email.settings.body.tex: The exported zip file will have this version number.
settings.section.email.main.body.title: E-mail
settings.section.email.main.body.text:
At the settings tab you can configure the e-mail settings.
These settings are the mail server settings.
If you don't provide the e-mail configuration, the system isn't capable of sending e-mails.
settings.section.export.settings.body.te: The exported zip file will have this version number.
settings.section.export.export.body.text: Export the entire project as zip file here.
settings.logs_and_errors_section.main.bo: View the access log, application log or error log here.
settings.theme.module.settings.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item
settings.theme.section.form.error.name.v: The name is required and minimal 3 characters in length.
settings.theme.section.form.error.source: The source is required and minimal 3 characters in length.
settings.theme.section.main.body.title: Themes
settings.theme.section.main.body.text: Download themes to get you started.
system.information.section.information.b: You can manually update the system and the cms here.
system.update.section.main.body.text: You can choose to update the OS manually or wait for the automatic update process.
It is scheduled once a week on saturday at 10:00 in the morning.
